alert.note: Alert for Miami-Dade (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 28 at 11:58AM EDT until July 28 at 12:15PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1215 PM EDT FOR CENTRAL MIAMI-DADE COUNTY... At 1157 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near The Redland, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Homestead, Homestead General Airport, Kendall, The Redland and Florida City. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
